turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order some pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four medium pizzas, all thick crust. Two of them, I want

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pepperoni, extra cheese, and black olives. One of them I would like chicken, pineapple, and basil, and then last one, I like beef, extra cheese, pepperoni, sausage, and bell peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me repeat your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 medium thick crust pizzas, 2 pepperoni, black olives, extra cheese, 1 chicken, pineapple, basil, 1 beef, pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, and extra cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $80, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery, or dine in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.
